Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for comparable salary and other benefits for certain state employees
Summary: Provides for comparable salary and other benefits for state employees designated managerial or confidential to ensure such employees receive an increase in salary at least equal to the percentage of the general salary increases provided to employees in a bargaining unit that receives the highest percentage general salary increase and other benefits.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to comparable salary and other benefits
